com.impetus.eej2.cache.dao

Class EIECacheDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impetus.eej2.cache.dao.EIECacheDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEIECacheDao

    public class EIECacheDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEIECacheDao

    An implementation of IEIECacheDao to fetch records from Cassandra Cluster.

    • Method Detail

      • getEIEResponse

        public EIEResponse getEIEResponse(EIERequest eieReq)
        Description copied from interface: IEIECacheDao

        Gets the response from the Cassandra database based on the input request. In case data in not found in the database null response is returned. When any exception is thrown while fetching data, the exception is wrapped up in EieCacheException

        Specified by:
        getEIEResponse in interface IEIECacheDao
        Returns:
        the EIEReponse to service Layer

      • addEIEExternalReponse

        public java.lang.Boolean addEIEExternalReponse(EIEResponse eieRes)
        Description copied from interface: IEIECacheDao

        Insert the record in the Cassandra database from the EIEResponse. Returns True in case data is written successfully else False.

        Specified by:
        addEIEExternalReponse in interface IEIECacheDao
        Returns:
        the output in boolean format to service layer
